name: Just as Plannet
description:
Platformer game for Mini Jam 107: Music².

This is my first game ever published so i hope you like it.

Feel free to share your scores and times in the comments, i wanna see how fast you can go!

GLHF!

(Do not press quit if you are playing in browser! You will have to reload the page!)

And of course there will be bugs, i know some that i was just not able to fix in time, and i am sorry beforehand if they occur a lot. I will learn from my mistakes!
